name: Middle Eastern Bean Salad
author: gubby420
summary: I crave this salad often, and I feel healthier after eating it! Best served at room temperature. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons minced garlic, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (15 ounce) can light red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup minced red onion, or to taste
1 pinch ground sumac, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and garlic together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper
Add parsley, kidney beans,  garbanzo beans, and onion; toss to coat
Sprinkle sumac over salad; season with salt and pepper
